text: A host is trying to send a packet to a device on a remote LAN segment, but there are currently no mappings in its ARP cache. How will the device obtain a destination MAC address? (a) It will send the frame and use its own MAC address as the destination. (b) It will send the frame with a broadcast MAC address. (c) It will send an ARP request for the MAC address of the destination device. (d) It will send an ARP request for the MAC address of the default gateway.
